Function Documentation

void __cvmx_helper_errata_qlm_disable_2nd_order_cdr ( int  qlm  ) 

Due to errata G-720, the 2nd order CDR circuit on CN52XX pass 1 doesn't work properly.

The following code disables 2nd order CDR for the specified QLM.

Parameters:
qlm QLM to disable 2nd order CDR for.

void __cvmx_qlm_pcie_idle_dac_tweak ( void   ) 

Errata G-16174: QLM Gen2 PCIe IDLE DAC change.

CN68XX pass 1.x, CN66XX pass 1.x and CN63XX pass 1.0-2.2 QLM tweak. This function tweaks the JTAG setting for a QLMs for PCIe to run better.

int  baud_mhz,
int  old_multiplier 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Decrement the MPLL Multiplier for the DLM as per Errata G-20669

Parameters:
qlm DLM to configure
baud_mhz Speed of the DLM configured at
old_multiplier MPLL_MULTIPLIER value to decrement
void __cvmx_qlm_speed_tweak ( void   ) 

Errata G-16094: QLM Gen2 Equalizer Default Setting Change.

CN68XX pass 1.x and CN66XX pass 1.x QLM tweak. This function tweaks the JTAG setting for a QLMs to run better at 5 and 6.25Ghz.

Variable Documentation

const __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_t __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_cn52xx[]

The JTAG chain for CN52XX and CN56XX is 4 * 268 bits long, or 1072.

CN5XXX full chain shift is: new data => lane 3 => lane 2 => lane 1 => lane 0 => data out The JTAG chain for CN63XX is 4 * 300 bits long, or 1200. The JTAG chain for CN68XX is 4 * 304 bits long, or 1216. The JTAG chain for CN66XX/CN61XX/CNF71XX is 4 * 304 bits long, or 1216. CN6XXX full chain shift is: new data => lane 0 => lane 1 => lane 2 => lane 3 => data out Shift LSB first, get LSB out

const __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_t __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_cn56xx[]
const __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_t __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_cn63xx[]
const __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_t __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_cn66xx[]
const __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_t __cvmx_qlm_jtag_field_cn68xx[]
